title: Convenient Audio Controls for ChatGPT
summary: Enhanced audio controls and playback management for ChatGPT conversations, providing convenient access to text-to-speech functionality.
previewAlt: Audio controls interface for ChatGPT showing playback controls

title: Read Aloud Button for ChatGPT
summary: Chrome extension that adds a persistent Read Aloud button to ChatGPT's bottom toolbar for easy access to text-to-speech functionality.
previewAlt: Chrome extension icon showing speaker icon in ChatGPT interface

title: The AI Evaluation System
summary: Modular system for comparing different AI models, prompts, and settings against each other to enable systematic evaluation and optimization.
previewAlt: AI evaluation system architecture diagram showing model comparison workflow

title: Independent AI Integration Engineering Project Proposal
summary: Strategic project proposal outlining an independent AI integration engineering initiative with milestones, budgets, and staffing requirements.
previewAlt: Project proposal document preview showing strategic planning elements

title: AI Model Evaluation Systems Diagram
summary: Interactive React flowchart that visualizes an AI evaluation pipeline with tooltips and a mini simulation.
